TEXT.TITLE: INTERPUBLIC GROUP OF COS <IPG> SETS DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Interpublic Group of Companies said it declared a regular quarterly dividend of 17 cts a share payable December 15 to shareholdres or record November 27. Reuter
